ISSUE.TITLE: KendoUI script error after upgrade to latest dev branch
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I developed some modules on Kendo UI framework and that works fine. after upgrade to the latest dev branch, this error occurred on my page: `Uncaught TypeError: jQuery(...).kendoLoader is not a function` I think this is because ResorceManagement class moved `<script src="/OrchardCore.Resources/Scripts/jquery.js"></script>` to the end of page. how can I set `OrchardCore.Resources` scripts inserted in `<head>` tag??

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Media cache : Azure Blob Storage issue with 0 byte files (#8750)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix a bug and add a test when a resource at head and a resource at foot have the same dependency and the dependency is moved at foot fixes #9394
Fixes #9394 If A at Foot depends on B at Head, B should stay at Head
